subject: Suits and Litigation
Coaches and Managers
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: The former Kentucky Coach Billy Gillispie has filed a lawsuit against the university’s athletics association, seeking $6 million after his firing last spring. Gillispie, who has a home near Lexington, filed the lawsuit in federal court in Dallas.
